entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload sets in VS #41607
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • dotnet test cache/result output cache #41589
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588

Closed

  • Different build output for classic projects: NuGet packages vs project reference. Is this on purpose? #2203
    Backlog
  • PreserveCompilationContext should not depend on reference assemblies installed in Program Files #2054
    Backlog
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]The string "Configured to use loose manifests when installing new manifests." is not localized in dotnet --info output on Loc OS. #41180
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41604
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41602
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown

Merged

  • [release/8.0.4xx] Fix frameworks option forwarding for 'dotnet nuget why' #41586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix frameworks option forwarding for 'dotnet nuget why' #41585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
